preface.para:
The goal of this document, a project of
olpcSF.org
, is to provide helpful documentation of the pathagar book server project and more specifically to help with installation, configuration and usage of this service software on low energy requiring hardware. We began with the DreamPlug but have since switched to the Raspberry Pi as our device of choice.
